response.explain: The previous action was to close the oven, which was successful as there was no execution error. The next step in the original subtasks is to move the robot to the fridge. However, the robot already has the cheese tart in its inventory, which is not in line with the original subtasks. The cheese tart should be in the fridge before the robot moves to the fridge. Therefore, the robot should first open the fridge, put the cheese tart inside, and then close the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Put the cheese tart inside the fridge to freeze it
(4) Close the fridge
(5) Move the robot to the oven again
(6) Open the oven
(7) Grasp the frozen cheese tart from the fridge
(8) Put the frozen cheese tart in the oven
(9) Close the oven
(10) Turn on the oven to cook the cheese tart
